title: 'Cow Wells And Cow Bells' | feat. Billy Porter and Joshua Boone
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Greed. Deception. Adorable baby cows. Billy Porter ("Pose") and Joshua Boone ("Seven Seconds") star in this East African folktale that asks: "is honesty always the best policy?"
itunes:author: WBUR
